profile.description.first: I am Ismaël, with more than three decades(-ish) of navigating the dynamic currents of life's great journey.
profile.description.second: With a fervent passion for syntax in all its forms, from the elegance of literature to the precision of code, I am a developer with 4 years of experience in web development. My expertise spans various technologies and frameworks, allowing me to craft engaging user experiences.
